morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does oneself or is done to one
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are female or take a feminine form
morphInfos.description: a woman that _is done _ good _(by herself?)_
morphInfos.explanation: an action that is done to (or for?) a female person or thing that is doing something
